explains: adv. 双重地；加倍地；双摺地

sentences.en: In pregnancy a high fibre diet is doubly important.
sentences.cn: 怀孕期间高纤维饮食倍加重要。

sentences.en: Customers were doubly deceived, the lawsuit claims.
sentences.cn: 诉讼结果表示，消费者受到了双重欺骗。

sentences.en: I made doubly sure I locked all the doors when I went out.
sentences.cn: 我一再查看所有的门都锁好后才出的门。
